data.title: Film Stars who Died Young
data.text:
Many of the film stars who are rocking in their movie career suddenly died due to some irritations in their personal life. Let us look at the reason behind the following stars death……

Jiah Khan:

Award winner of Filmfare for the best female debut of the film Nishabd, Jiah Khan died when she was 25 years old. Jiah appeared in many hit movies from Bollywood. On June 13th 2013, khan hanged herself and found dead at her apartments. After the beautiful actress death, her sister found a suicide note which says, the reason behind her death is her boyfriend.

Aarti Agarwal:

Beautiful Gujarati actress Aarti died because of Cardiac Arrest. Agarwal was just 31-years-old when she was dead. Andala Ramudu fame Aarti gave massive hits in her career. At the age of 16 she stepped into film industry with the bollywood movie Paagalpan. Later debuted with Nuvvu Naku Nachav with actor Venkatesh in Telugu and was a blockbuster hit.

Uday Kiran:

Lover boy Uday kiran who tasted a huge success in his small span of movie career died at the age of 33. Because of financial crisis and lag in his film career he committed suicide out of depression on January 5th 2014. Many of them claimed that, the then union minister Chiranjeevi is the reason behind his depression. Chitram, Nuvvu Nenu and Manasantha Nuvve are the three consecutive hits in his career which earned him the name “Hat-Trick Hero.”

Taruni Sachdev:

Amitabh Bachchan’s classmate in the movie Paa, Taruni died on May 14th 2012 due to plane crash. Agni Air Flight CHT was crashed on her 14th birthday in Nepal. Sachdev acted for many advertisements for products such as Rasna, Colgate, ICICI Bank, Reliance Mobile etc... The cute actress was the highest paid child actress of her time.

Yasho Sagar:

Ullasamga Utsahamga fame Yasho sagar gained much fame with his debut film which was a big hit at box-office. As his career is going in good peaks he met with a car accident and died on December 25th 2012. Yasho is the son of Kannada film producer B. P. Somu.

Shikha Joshi:

Model-turned actress Shikha is well known for her appearance in Ajay Bahl directorial B.A. Pass. Joshi committed suicide by gashing her throat with Knife in bathroom at the age of 40. As per the available video, this was recorded before her death says that Dr.vijay and many married man are the reason behind her suicide. It was later known that Dr vijay has sexually harassed her at the time of breast implant surgery.
